name: The Croods
description:
The Croods is an arcade game developed by Rovio Entertainment. It came out on 14-03-2013. It was published by Rovio Entertainment.
You can play The Croods on iOS and Android.
It was produced by Jane Hartwell and Kristine Belson. It was directed by Chris Sanders and Kirk DeMicco. Alan Silvestri scored the game.
